comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_J._Pershing "John Joseph "Black Jack" Pershing (September 13, 1860 – July 15, 1948), was a general officer in the United States Army who led the American Expeditionary Forces in World War I."

comment._content: Thanks swanq, we'll add Gen. Pershing's full name to the catalog record.
